Subject: Heritrix - Getting involved
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=248067999

Hello,

I'm a student of Computer Science at a German university. I'm looking 
for a challenging topic for my diploma thesis. As I've been working on 
crawling/searching in the past (FTP and SMB) I would like to put my 
knowledge in this area to use.

So I've taken a look at the Heritrix crawler and would like to get 
involved in this project. Perhaps it's possible to work on an relatively 
isolated sub-project? The wiki has some TODOs/future directions. I think 
I could be of help in areas where some research and testing is required 
(which approach to choose, etc.). The time frame for my thesis is six 
months.

Any suggestions on how I could help?


Martin

http://www.martinien.de/
